text: The ultimate challenger faced one challenge too great.
Now that's what you call a breach of contract.
Can't you water my garden while you're at it?
That's why wolves should stay in packs..
Lavish, excentric but most of all very much dead.
Did nobody tell poor Thorgar that he's not the main character?
Well would you look at that, time to look for a new title..
So the Everchosen's bootlicker is not so immortal after all..
Fitting end for a person who has done nothing but watch the sea meaninglessly for centuries.
Never knew why the Liche Lord favours the sun so much..
He who came all the way out here just to die..
